---------------------
(1.) Build procedure.
---------------------

    * RapidXML is a header-only library so no build is necessary.

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

------------------
(2.) Installation.
------------------

    * All RapidXML library versions should be installed into versioned
      subfolders in the "RapidXML" subfolder of the base 3rd party library
      folder.
        * Version subfolders should contain only the version number.
        * Example for RapidXML 1.13: P:/3rdParty/RapidXML/1.13.
